name: Simple Wireframes
description:
What is simple wireframes?

A component kit to help designers and developers building webpages. The kit has the core structures found in almost all kinds of land pages or websites.


Features

  • Pre-made wireframes ready to use
  • Global color to use your own colors
  • Base typography styles created
  • Component 8 grid based
  • Layers following the visual design


🚀 Last Updates

---------------------------------------------------


20/10/2021


Improvements

  • Added simple calendar wireframes
  • Added search inputs wireframe
  • Added a vertical header wireframe
  • Mobiled wireframes page

Fixes

  • Header layers following the visual design.
  • Changed button component names for a better visual localization at the assets page.
  • Adjustments to the components display on assets panel by changing the components frame name.
